00030 /*
00031  * pmap_getport.c
00032  * Client interface to pmap rpc service.
00033  *
00034  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #include <stdbool.h>
00038 #include <unistd.h>
00039 #include "Rpc.h"
00040 #include "Pmap_prot.h"
00041 #include "Pmap_clnt.h"
00042 #include <sys/socket.h>
00043 
00044 static struct timeval timeout = {5, 0};
00045 static struct timeval tottimeout = {60, 0};
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Find the mapped port for program,version.
00049  * Calls the pmap service remotely to do the lookup.
00050  * Returns 0 if no map exists.
00051  */
00052 u_short
00053 Pmap_getport (address, program, version, protocol)
00054      struct sockaddr_in *address;
00055      u_long program;
00056      u_long version;
00057      u_int protocol;
00058 {
00059   u_short port = 0;
00060   int socket = -1;
00061   Client *client;
00062   struct Pmap parms;
00063   bool closeit = false;
00064 
00065   address->sin_port = htons (PMAPPORT);
00066   if (protocol == IPPROTO_TCP)
00067     {
00068       client = Clnttcp_create(address, PMAPPROG, PMAPVERS, &socket,
00069                                        RPCSMALLMSGSIZE, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE);
00070     }
00071   else
00072     client = Clntudp_bufcreate(address, PMAPPROG, PMAPVERS, timeout,
00073                                         &socket, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE,
00074                                         RPCSMALLMSGSIZE);
00075   if (client == (Client *) NULL) {
00076     return 0;
00077   }
00078   parms.pm_prog = program;
00079   parms.pm_vers = version;
00080   parms.pm_prot = protocol;
00081   parms.pm_port = 0;        /* not needed or used */
00082   if (Clnt_call(client, PMAPPROC_GETPORT, Xdr_Pmap,
00083                  (caddr_t)&parms, Xdr_u_short,
00084                  (caddr_t)&port, tottimeout) != RPC_SUCCESS)
00085     {
00086       Clnt_perror(client, "Cannot register service");
00087       return 0;
00088     }
00089   CLNT_DESTROY(client);
00090   /* We only need to close the socket here if we opened  it.  */
00091   address->sin_port = 0;
00092   if (socket != -1)
00093                 (void)close(socket);
00094   return port;
00095 }
